greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Composite numbers (modulo 3).
comment: If you interpret this as a base 3 number then read as a decimal it would equal
mathematica: Composite[n_] := FixedPoint[n + PrimePi[ # ] + 1 &, n]; Table[ Mod[Composite[n], 3], {n, 105}]
results.author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Nov 11 2005
